original_text: King Hiram's men had brought gold from Ophir. King Solomon's men had helped them to do this. They also brought very good wood, and valuable jewels.
korean_text: (후람의 신하들과 솔로몬의 신하들도 오빌에서 금을 실어 올 때에 백단목과 보석을 가져온지라

sentences.original_text: King Hiram's men had brought gold from Ophir.
sentences.korean_translation: 히람 왕의 사람들이 오빌에서 금을 가져왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: King Solomon's men had helped them to do this.
They also brought very good wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 아주 좋은 나무를 가져왔습니다.
